short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill your browsing experience with bright sparkling stars following your cursor on the screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your web browsing even more interesting with the Cursor Trails extension! Add bright, sparkling stars that will follow your cursor around the screen, creating a unique atmosphere for each movement.

It's an easy way to personalize your web browsing experience a little. With every click or movement of your cursor, the screen will come to life, giving your cursor a little magic.

Cursor Trails allows you to personalize your cursor trail by adding effects to match your mood. You can choose between different cursor trail options, from stars to colorful effects, to turn your browser into a place full of bright moments.

Try Cursor Trails now and make your cursor trail even brighter and more exciting!
